attributes.action: Remove the principal dewlling house from Inheritance Tax liability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By removing the principal family dwelling house from IHT liability, when parents die, those still living in the property can continue to do so - e.g. dependant children or disabled dependants. It also would remove much of the antagonism towards this tax.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove the principal dewlling house from Inheritance Tax liability."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13185.asp

Prime Minister's Office
